title: Lapidated - The Stench Of Carnage (2014)
description:
Quote:
(Translated from Spanish)
" LAPIDATED " formed in January 2010 in the province of components of the band are AlmerÃƒÂ­a.Los Helios Ferrer on bass, Paul White on drums, Javi Sanchez on electric guitar , and Paul coines vocals. They all stem from ancient formations of the province ( Dyspepsia, Morvity ) . They rehearse for a while in the " Sugar " in Adra , while composing his own songs. Later they move to Aguadulce where still composing songs and preparing to start recording their first demo, " Devout of Flesh ," which came to light in November 2011 , in the " IV BrutalmerÃƒÂ­a Fest" , where 150 copies were distributed free . It is at this time when the band joins seal " Hecatombe Records " , releasing 200 copies of a promotional CD again.


In June 2012 the band moved to the rehearsal of the cultural and recreational cycle of El Ejido. In August this year Ellys Sanchez ( Daily Dose ) comes to replace Paul coines as a singer of the band. On Saturday November 10, 2012 " Lapidated " debuts on stage participating in the " VII BrutalmerÃƒÂ­a " in the room " Jala Jala " , AlmerÃƒÂ­a . Share the stage with " Endemned ", " Bloody Pussy" , " Christ Crisis" , " Undernoise " and " Carnivore DIPROSOPUS " . A month later , December 14th , the band participated in the "Decade of Barbarity tour" , sharing the stage with " Visceral Trail " Razor Rape " and" War Inside " in the room" Ground Floor " El Ejido (AlmerÃƒÂ­a ) . on January 18, 2013 " Lapidated " acting with " Onomasy " in the pub " Tide" in the Andalusian village of Roquetas de Mar, the band also shared the stage a month later in the Pub " Rock Zone " El Ejido. on April 12 the band held another concert again in the Pub " Rock Zone " by participating in the "Third Rock and bar" festival.


In mid-July , 2013 Paul coines reenters the voices replaces Ellys Sanchez , performing three concerts in Pub " Rock Zone " with Venezuelan " Subconscious " Dutch " Krush " and the Spanish " Your Meat " .


In 2014 comes out the first full length from the band ' The Stench Of Carnage' ' , B ' Aromestudio Records " by Paul White (Drums group ) between the months of December 2013 to March 2014. This CD is edited by " Hecatombe Records " and distributed throughout the world, with the collaboration of " Sevared Records " in America.


The Stench Of Carnage (2014)

Review From subterraneoheavy.com (Spanish)

Quote:
Quality, why not start a review with a word that covers everything? and this is what we have with this first work LAPIDATED; QUALITY and yes, with a capital.

Brutal death ten crushing and straight cuts. Contains guttural outs from the same underworld. The riffs fast, continuous and master guitar, accompanied by a brutal drums and bass, which looks like a guitar that give you power.

Since then the group presentation can not be better, do not let us catch air in no time, with tracks like "Flesh consumed", "Crimson surise" visceral "Devout of flesh" or putting an end to the album "Grotesque conception".

I know that in 2011 the band released a promotional CD with two tracks that are now included in this album, "Crimson sunrise" and "Devout of flesh." And I've read some criticism about the web, speaking well of the group to be your cover letter. Of course these guys are worth a lot.

Honestly they will recommend to everyone this album, it's one of those things you can not miss, and of course if it is possible to see them live I'll ... something I hope not complicated because they are not far away ... are Almeria ... yes, yes, here in Spain quality music is made of high quality.
